name: Ext_R4B_MedicationRequest_performer
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.MedicationRequest.performer for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationRequest.performer from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationRequest|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: The specified desired performer of the medication treatment (e.g. the performer of the medication administration).
element.comment: `MedicationRequest.performer` maps to R5 `MedicationRequest.performer`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Device)` has no mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as RelatedTo.

element.definition: The specified desired performer of the medication treatment (e.g. the performer of the medication administration).
element.comment: `MedicationRequest.performer` maps to R5 `MedicationRequest.performer`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Device)` has no mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as RelatedTo.
